item.description: Physical Rescue; INC#0388; 08:09AM; 20562 W Wood Rose Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gMgP2t; #Chatsworth; Two-vehicle collision resulting in one fatality, one person transported to a local trauma center in critical condition, and two others with minor injuries who declined transport (total of 4 patients). LAPD Inc #1082. Nothing further.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E28 E287 E70 E8 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA70 T87 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue (Fatality); INC#1804; 11:36PM; 109 S Rossmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3fgwFlB; Hancock Park; One motor vehicle collided with multiple parked vehicles, then ran into a tree, causing one person to be ejected and one to be trapped (both approximately 30 year-old males). Sadly, the trapped patient was deceased inside the vehicle. The ejected patient was transported by LAFD Firefighter/Paramedics to a regional trauma center. LAPD Inc #4734. Nothing further.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC5 E227 E27 E52 E61 EM11 EM14 HR3 RA27 RA29 RA52 RA61 T27 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1677; 10:04PM; 3525 E 15th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sE1fsu; #BoyleHeights; The first 26 arriving firefighters quickly located contents burning inside of a one-story commercial building and extinguished the flames in 15 minutes from the time of alarm. No injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E17 E202 E209 E210 E9 EM1 RA25 SQ21 T10 T2; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1677; 09:49PM; 3525 E 15th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SKchXV; Boyle Heights; One-story commercial with smoke showing.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E202 E209 E9 EM1 RA25 T2; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1257; 06:43PM; 11770 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Lo2Fiz; #HansenDam; 58 firefighters held several spot fires in check, which were scattered in remote terrain. Air Operations made early drops to keep the flames in check. It took one hour and fifty minutes to access these areas by ground, cut perimeter lines, and fully contain all spot fires. Cause under active investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E24 E274 E275 E298 E75 E77 E8140 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 T74 T75 T98 WT77; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1257; 04:53PM; 11770 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Lo2Fiz; #HansenDam; First-arriving engine reporting three separate small fires in the brush.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; E298 E8140 T98; CH8; Nicholas Prange

CONTROLLED Structure Fire; INC#1501; 11:30PM; 213 E 3rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Db2hRt; #DowntownLA; *Corrected Address* Approximately 135 firefighters responded to the three-story abandoned commercial with heavy fire showing. Defensive operations were safe and effective in order to knock down the bulk of the fire. Firefighters quickly extinguished fire that extended to one unit of the neighboring 5-story residential building before it spread any further (with help from a fire sprinkler). Firefighters will be on scene for an extended period of time to uncover and extinguish any smoldering debris within the burned out structure. There was no collapse during the incident, but the building has been red-tagged by Building and Safety and nearby sidewalks are closed to the public as a precaution, as there are signs of compromised structural integrity. It remains unsafe for firefighters to enter and the official "KNOCKDOWN" declaration will likely be tomorrow morning. LAFD RS3 and heavy equipment will aid in the efforts. No injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC2 BC5 CM21 CM722 E1 E10 E11 E12 E14 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E221 E226 E235 E250 E266 E274 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HE1 HR3 PI2 RA1 RA11 RA2 RA25 RA809 RA9 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T2 T20 T21 T26 T3 T35 T50 T66 T74 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 10/26/2022 INC#1501

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1501; 08:20PM; 268 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DKSPWN; #DowntownLA; At least 120 firefighters continue to battle the three-story commercial building. The structure is showing signs of a potential for collapse. Companies have increased their distance, allowing a buffer for a "collapse zone," a continue flowing heavy streams from the exterior. Intense heat exposed a neighboring five-story residential building, where one unit has caught fire. Thankfully, fire sprinklers are holding the fire in check and preventing rapid spread, as firefighters ascend the stairs to address that unit. PIO/Firefighter David Ortiz is on scene.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC2 BC5 CM21 CM722 E1 E10 E11 E12 E14 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E221 E226 E235 E266 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 PI2 RA1 RA11 RA2 RA25 RA809 RA9 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T2 T20 T21 T26 T3 T35 T66 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1501; 07:33PM; 268 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DKSPWN; #DowntownLA; Three-story boarded-up commercial with fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E209 E4 RA809 RA9 SQ21 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 10/26/2022 INC#0278

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0278; 08:45AM; 6261 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3m1G0hq; #NorthHollywood; Over 100 LAFD firefighters battled the blaze at an abandoned restaurant in defensive mode for two hours and five minutes. The building sustained heavy damage during an extended period of fire that weakened the structural integrity, causing a substantial collapse. Approximately eight other small fires in the same area (within the span of approximately an hour) are being investigated alongside this one by LAFD Arson Investigators, however there is currently no evidence connecting these fires. It is still early in the investigation, and Fire Investigators are working closely with LAPD to gather evidence and track all leads. One person of interest has been detained for questioning. Excavators are being brought in to assist with the overhaul of this building and RS3 continues to work on scene in areas that are excessively dangerous for personnel to enter. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 AR10 AR22 AR33 BC10 BC11 BC12 BC14 BC5 CE83 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E261 E27 E278 E288 E289 E298 E35 E39 E60 E76 E77 E86 EA1 EM14 EM18 HE1 HR3 PI1 RA102 RA60 RA827 RA89 RI200 RS3 RT83 T39 T60 T61 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR27 UR88; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange
